project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Create a Python script that generates a random password with configurable length and ensures it includes uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.

task.name: Implement the core password generation function
Implement the user input function to specify password length
Ensure the generated password meets the criteria (upper, lower, numbers, special characters)
Write tests for the password generation function and user input length
Execute tests on the password generation functionality to ensure it works correctly
